sources.name: OECD, Gender Wage Gap (2017)
sources.dataPublisherSource: The OECD wage gap is calculated using the OECD Employment Database

fields.name: Gender wage gap (OECD 2017)
fields.description: The gender wage gap is unadjusted and is defined as the difference between median earnings of men and women relative to median earnings of men. Data refer to full-time employees and to self-employed.
